code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{endpoints}from'../config';import'./Experience.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Experience=()=>{const[experience,setExperience]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch(endpoints.experience).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setExperience(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching experience:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"section-title",children:"Experience"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"experience-grid",children:experience.map((exp,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card experience-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"experience-role",children:exp.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"experience-company",children:exp.company}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"experience-period",children:exp.period}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"experience-achievements",children:exp.achievements.map((achievement,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:achievement},i))})]},index))})]});};export default Experience;
